pageDesc.description: Welcome to my website, here you can see all the projects I've worked on, some information about me, how to contact me and my blog in which I post updates about my projects. Enjoy your stay!

projects.title: MP's Website
projects.description: This website is my personal website. I use it to display the things I've worked on and my blog which contain updates on my upcoming projects. The website is made using Vue.js for the client and the server is running an Express.js app to allow for API end points and more creative options.

projects.title: Big Chungus Bot
projects.description: Big Chungus Bot is a API application for Discord build with Discord.js. He's a general purpose Discord bot that can give users custom colors, make announcements and titles. He has many for awsome features you can check the Github or try him out to find out more.

entry1.title: MP's Website
entry1.description: This here very website. What else can I say?

aboutMe.title: Basic Information
aboutMe.description: I'm MentoskaPraha, I’m an amateur programmer and average gamer. I program in HTML/CSS and Typescript and my timezone is EET/EEST or GMT+2/GMT+3. I speak a few languages like: English, Czech and French. I almost always work on websites or API applications, but I do occasionally work on games not related to the web in any way. I like to play video games with my friends and we most commonly play games like Sea of Thieves, Don’t Starve Together, Prison Architect and Satisfactory. That’s me in a nutshell, I play video games and I write code.
